thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Recruiter Hays posts growth in Q3 net fees

title: Recruiter Hays posts growth in Q3 net fees
text:
April 12, 2018 / 6:39 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago Recruiter Hays posts growth in Q3 net fees Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - British recruitment company Hays Plc on Thursday said net fees in the third quarter rose 9 percent, and trading conditions in the UK and Ireland remained subdued but broadly stable. 
The company, which places workers in the finance and construction sectors, said net fees in the UK and Ireland fell 2 percent, as fees from its private-sector business dropped 3 percent 
On a constant currency basis, adjusted group net fees grew 11 percent in the third quarter which ended on March 31. Reporting by Radhika Rukmangadhan in Bengaluru; Editing by Sunil Nair
